>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/invoiceitem/{invoiceitemid:[0-9]+}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the detailed information about an invoice item with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"invoiceitemid":{"description":"Invoice item ID","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
